description: Storing matter as data. Simple, secure, convient.
At this point you probably have a lot of stuff. Like tons of it. So much it's hard to keep, sort, and find all you need.

/b/Applied Energistics 2/b/ (AE2) provides a solution: /b/Store stuff in data disks/b/ and /6/acess them through a single terminal/6/ with a /b/search bar/b/. These /b/Matter Energy/b/ (ME) Networks provide powerful logistics and automation solutions via the various devices that can be installed on a network.

<text>The in-game guide has a habit of crashing, so refer to the <underline><dark_aqua><link href="https://guide.appliedenergistics.org/1.20.1">Online Documentation</link></dark_aqua></underline> for everything you need to know about <aqua>ME Networks</aqua></text>
